mapper.select: select count(*) from product where memberId = #{memberId} and isProductCheck = 1

select productId, memberId, productTitle, startPrice, bidPrice, startTime, expireTime from product where memberId = #{memberId} and isProductCheck = 1 order by expireTime desc limit #{criteria.pageStart}, #{criteria.perPageNum}

select productId, categoryName, productTitle, productContent, startPrice, bidPrice, startTime, expireTime from product where isProductCheck = 1 and product.productId = #{productId} and memberId = #{memberId}

select image.productId, uploadPath, uploadFileName, fileExtension from image left join product on image.productId = product.productId where isProductCheck = 1 and product.productId = #{productId} and product.memberId = #{memberId}
mapper.update: update product set isProductCheck = 0 where productId = #{productId} and memberId = #{memberId};
